Detailed Description

Displays and processes the mail send form.

This file is included by the print_mail module and includes the mail form display, validation and submit hooks.

Function Documentation

_print_mail_encode_urls ( $  matches  ) 

Callback function for the preg_replace_callback replacing spaces with 20

Replace spaces in URLs with 20

Parameters:
$matches array with the matched tag patterns, usually <a...>+text+
Returns:
tag with re-written URL
